thread.title: Android Circuit: Samsung Fights For Apple Users, Sony Xperia Wins IFA, Motorola 'Better Than Google'
thread.title_full: Android Circuit: Samsung Fights For Apple Users, Sony Xperia Wins IFA, Motorola 'Better Than Google' - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Android Circuit: Samsung Fights For Apple Users, Sony Xperia Wins IFA, Motorola 'Better Than Google'
text: This week’s Android Circuit includes the launch dates for the new Nexus smartphones, Sony's new Xperia Z5 handsets, a review of the Moto X Style, thoughts on Samsung's Test Drive, the leaked images of the BlackBerry Venice, Android Wear on iOS, Lenovo's curious devices from IFA, Google's new logo and branding, and a new UI for Skype on Android. »
